reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Reasonable price and I like the fact that is unscented.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use the on my dryer lint trap
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to remove lint from my dryer lint trap. They are a good price and they do the job to remove lint. Will probably buy another package after I finish these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Less Expensive, Works Well
reviews.reviewText: As a product stated as biodegradable, the sheets are pretty flimsy and can tear if not handled with care. Also can be a little bit of a challenge to remove from that pack at times on a single sheet basis. That said, it works for the intended purposes and is less expensive than other alternatives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazon Basics Flushable Adult Toilet Wipes are a game-changer in the bathroom hygiene department. The packaging is sleek and convenient, fitting seamlessly into my routine. The wipes themselves are pleasantly moist and effectively get the job done. The flushable aspect is a huge plus, and they break down well without causing any plumbing concerns. I appreciate the gentle formula – no irritation, just a refreshing clean feeling. If you're on the lookout for a reliable and convenient addition to your bathroom essentials, these wipes are a must-try. Freshness delivered with the click of a button – Amazon Basics, you've nailed it! 🚽🌿👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little bigger than average
reviews.reviewText: These are nice. Conveniently wrapped in smaller packages so they travel well. I don’t think that they’re that much better than other brands on the market for the money. But they are a good value and they are good on sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just Okay Flushable Wipes
reviews.reviewText: These Amazon branded flushable wipes are just okay. I use a flushable white every time I go, and have this tested a handful of options. These Amazon wipes do not come out of the package nicely. Often two will come out at the same time or they will get stuck. It also does not have a very substantial closing and sealing mechanism on the package; it's more or less sticky tape without any hard back. They are difficult to close fully to prevent from drying out. These Amazon wipes are also not particularly durable, it can be a bit precarious if you wipe with too much pressure. They aren't wimpy wipes, just okay.If you have a Costco membership I would recommend the Kirkland branded wipes if you are looking for a similar product that is more user friendly. The Kirkland packages close nicer and have a hard plastic latch and seal. They are roughly the same size and durability but they will come out of the package one at a time and not dry out.If you are looking for a "premium" flushable butt wipe experience, I would say Dude wipes are the best. They are larger and more durable. They don't produce lint if you need to wipe a bit aggressively.And they also have a plastic latch that typically works well, though I have had it fail before. Just came right off. Couldn't close them. Far in-between occurrences with that complaint though. However, I think the size of Dude wipes and the price is a little bit overboard. That said you can find them on Amazon on sale throughout the year.Happy wiping folks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BYE-BYE Costco brand and Cottonelle!
reviews.reviewText: BYE-BYE Costco brand and Cottonelle! These have a VERY light clean scent. I appreciate that it's not over powering. What I like most about these is that when you pull a tissue out only ONE comes out. Im so sick of these other brands pulling one out and the rest of the pack comes with it!. These are on the same price point as the other brands without the hassle of having to go to the store. Even better if you add it to a subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually buy Cottonelle wipes but figured I’d give these a try. Pretty good product. Much cheaper per pack and works just as great so far
